messages.message:
https://prod.jenkins.instabase.com/job/deployments/job/deploy-dogfood/job/master/
The post-declarative actions step is aborting everytime on deploy-dogfood. This step runs the goldens and system tests. The abort time corresponds to the 4 hr mark when the next deploy dogfood starts.
We may need to reduce number of tests run per deploy to get this to green.

@Anil If you take a look at the latest run, for some reason the goldens test run took very long: https://prod.jenkins.instabase.com/job/tests/job/golden-test-runner-Release/job/master/ each suite taking 40min+, and we have 4 suites, so that's nearly 3 hours. Which left system tests with no time to run basically.

https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C029Z1XRKGR/p1680044866709779
Also, another thing I really wanted to understand is how does the recent cluster downsizing impacted our e2e tests.
